member.name: M:HelperLibrary.ReadValues.GetDouble(System.String)
member.summary: Asks user to provide input as double. Uses default error message.
member.remarks: There is no attemps limit. User needs to provide proper input.

member.name: M:HelperLibrary.ReadValues.GetDouble(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Asks user to provide input as double.
member.remarks: There is no attemps limit. User needs to provide proper double input.
member.param: Message displayed when user's input is incorrect

member.name: M:HelperLibrary.ReadValues.GetDouble(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Asks user to provide input as double. Uses default error message and default result
member.param: Number of attempts to get correct input

member.name: M:HelperLibrary.ReadValues.GetDouble(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Double)
member.summary: Asks user to provide input as double.
member.param: Message displayed when user's input is incorrect
Number of attempts to get correct input
Default value when all attempts are used
